message.body: Can u please let les know suzanne and I will be about 30 min late?
I know that you would do the same for me in a heartbeat! Also, I wanted to tell you I'm stopping at elcys on my way to school to drop off a card for Rhiannon! :)
Thanks! I want to make sure we follow up!
U good fir train or still want a ride?
Aw thanks. There was a 7:17 so I ran and got it! I will definitely take a rude next week if we get out at the time we're actually supposed to! Congrats on starting clinic and have a good weekend!!!!!
I really do appreciate the offer. This is the year of sharing and caring! If we're ever all going to come together it will be now!
Congrats to you too! I think it started off pretty awesome- and you're right we can all get through this if we pull together :-)
